GAVCompliance.description: Guaranteed compliance with the GAV-conformity. Only relevant for DSB.

GAVName.description: GAV-Designation. Only relevant for DSB. Mandatory if GAVCompliance = 'Yes'

UVGRiskNo.description: UVG risk number of the insured risk. Required in offer request for the customer but not the coInsuredCustomer. Optional in the offer for the customer as well as coInsuredCustomer, but should be provided if the insurer's risk classification (tariff classification) is directly based on the UVG risk number (without additional internal mapping). If the risk number used by the insurer is different from the request, the updated value should be provided in the offer. For newly formed companies without a risk number, use the value 0000.00.

NOGACodeMain.description: Main NOGA-Code. Required in offer request. Should be provided in the offer if the insurer's risk classification (tariff classification) is directly based on the NOGA Code (without additional internal mapping). If the NOGA code used by the insurer is different from the request, the updated value should be provided in the offer.

typeOfActivity.description: Type of activity of the company
